recipes.title: Dovga
recipes.description: A refreshing yogurt-based soup with herbs and rice.
steps: In a pot. whisk yogurt with water and egg until smooth.. Add washed rice and bring to a boil. stirring constantly to prevent curdling.. Reduce heat and cook until rice is tender. about 20 minutes.. Finely chop spinach. cilantro. and dill. Add them to the soup.. Season with salt and pepper. Simmer for an additional 10 minutes and serve warm or chilled..

recipes.title: Kutabs
recipes.description: Thin dough pockets stuffed with meat or herbs.
steps: Mix flour and water to form a soft dough. Let it rest for 30 minutes.. For the filling. mix minced meat. finely chopped onion. cumin. salt. and pepper.. Divide dough into small balls. roll them into thin circles. and place filling on one side.. Fold over the dough and seal the edges. Cook on a dry skillet until browned on both sides.. Brush with melted butter and garnish with chopped cilantro..newfe

recipes.title: Tiramisu
recipes.description: A classic no-bake dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
steps: Separate eggs into yolks and whites. Beat yolks with sugar until creamy.
Mix in mascarpone cheese and vanilla extract until smooth.
Whip egg whites to stiff peaks and gently fold into the mascarpone mixture.
Dip ladyfingers in espresso and layer them in a dish. Spread a layer of mascarpone mixture on top.
Repeat layers and dust with cocoa powder. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: A simple salad with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
steps: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into even slices.. Layer them alternately on a plate. placing a basil leaf between each slice.. Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar over the salad.. Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.Thisis. New.Featurel.

recipes.title: Dovga
recipes.description: A refreshing yogurt-based soup with herbs and rice.
steps: In a pot, whisk yogurt with water and egg until smooth.
Add washed rice and bring to a boil, stirring constantly to prevent curdling.
Reduce heat and cook until rice is tender, about 20 minutes.
Finely chop spinach, cilantro, and dill. Add them to the soup.
Season with salt and pepper. Simmer for an additional 10 minutes and serve warm or chilled.

recipes.title: Kutabs
recipes.description: Thin dough pockets stuffed with meat or herbs.
steps: Mix flour and water to form a soft dough. Let it rest for 30 minutes.. For the filling. mix minced meat. finely chopped onion. cumin. salt. and pepper.. Divide dough into small balls. roll them into thin circles. and place filling on one side.. Fold over the dough and seal the edges. Cook on a dry skillet until browned on both sides.. Brush with melted butter and garnish with chopped cilantro.

recipes.title: Tiramisu
recipes.description: A classic no-bake dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
steps: Separate eggs into yolks and whites. Beat yolks with sugar until creamy.
Mix in mascarpone cheese and vanilla extract until smooth.
Whip egg whites to stiff peaks and gently fold into the mascarpone mixture.
Dip ladyfingers in espresso and layer them in a dish. Spread a layer of mascarpone mixture on top.
Repeat layers and dust with cocoa powder. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: A simple salad with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
steps: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into even slices.
Layer them alternately on a plate, placing a basil leaf between each slice.
Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar over the salad.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Dovga
recipes.description: A refreshing yogurt-based soup with herbs and rice.
steps: In a pot, whisk yogurt with water and egg until smooth.
Add washed rice and bring to a boil, stirring constantly to prevent curdling.
Reduce heat and cook until rice is tender, about 20 minutes.
Finely chop spinach, cilantro, and dill. Add them to the soup.
Season with salt and pepper. Simmer for an additional 10 minutes and serve warm or chilled.

recipes.title: Kutabs
recipes.description: Thin dough pockets stuffed with meat or herbs.
steps: Mix flour and water to form a soft dough. Let it rest for 30 minutes.
For the filling, mix minced meat, finely chopped onion, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Divide dough into small balls, roll them into thin circles, and place filling on one side.
Fold over the dough and seal the edges. Cook on a dry skillet until browned on both sides.
Brush with melted butter and garnish with chopped cilantro.

recipes.title: Tiramisu
recipes.description: A classic no-bake dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
steps: Separate eggs into yolks and whites. Beat yolks with sugar until creamy.
Mix in mascarpone cheese and vanilla extract until smooth.
Whip egg whites to stiff peaks and gently fold into the mascarpone mixture.
Dip ladyfingers in espresso and layer them in a dish. Spread a layer of mascarpone mixture on top.
Repeat layers and dust with cocoa powder. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: A simple salad with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
steps: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into even slices.
Layer them alternately on a plate, placing a basil leaf between each slice.
Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar over the salad.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.

recipes.description: A refreshing yogurt-based soup with herbs and rice.
steps: In a pot, whisk yogurt with water and egg until smooth.
Add washed rice and bring to a boil, stirring constantly to prevent curdling.
Reduce heat and cook until rice is tender, about 20 minutes.
Finely chop spinach, cilantro, and dill. Add them to the soup.

recipes.title: Kutabs
recipes.description: Thin dough pockets stuffed with meat or herbs.
steps: Mix flour and water to form a soft dough. Let it rest for 30 minutes.
For the filling, mix minced meat, finely chopped onion, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Divide dough into small balls, roll them into thin circles, and place filling on one side.
Fold over the dough and seal the edges. Cook on a dry skillet until browned on both sides.
Brush with melted butter and garnish with chopped cilantro.

Repeat layers and dust with cocoa powder. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: A simple salad with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
steps: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into even slices.
Layer them alternately on a plate, placing a basil leaf between each slice.
Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar over the salad.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Dovga
recipes.description: A refreshing yogurt-based soup with herbs and rice.
steps: In a pot, whisk yogurt with water and egg until smooth.
Add washed rice and bring to a boil, stirring constantly to prevent curdling.
Reduce heat and cook until rice is tender, about 20 minutes.
Finely chop spinach, cilantro, and dill. Add them to the soup.
Season with salt and pepper. Simmer for an additional 10 minutes and serve warm or chilled.

recipes.title: Kutabs
recipes.description: Thin dough pockets stuffed with meat or herbs.
steps: Mix flour and water to form a soft dough. Let it rest for 30 minutes.
For the filling, mix minced meat, finely chopped onion, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Divide dough into small balls, roll them into thin circles, and place filling on one side.
Fold over the dough and seal the edges. Cook on a dry skillet until browned on both sides.
Brush with melted butter and garnish with chopped cilantro.

recipes.title: Tiramisu
recipes.description: A classic no-bake dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
steps: Separate eggs into yolks and whites. Beat yolks with sugar until creamy.
Mix in mascarpone cheese and vanilla extract until smooth.
Whip egg whites to stiff peaks and gently fold into the mascarpone mixture.
Dip ladyfingers in espresso and layer them in a dish. Spread a layer of mascarpone mixture on top.
Repeat layers and dust with cocoa powder. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.

recipes.description: A simple salad with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
steps: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into even slices.

Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.

Finely chop spinach, cilantro, and dill. Add them to the soup.
Season with salt and pepper. Simmer for an additional 10 minutes and serve warm or chilled.
